mean_en: a stone that forms part of a corner in the outside wall of a building and that often shows the date when the building was built
word_etyma: corner角落 + stone石 → con＝cornerstone 基础；柱石；地基
sentence: The cornerstone of our church is a block of granite with the date of the building carved into it.
sentence_trans: 我们教堂的奠基石是一块黑色的花岗岩，上面刻有修建时间。
